venue.address_1: Corner of Rt 66 and Harvestwood Rd.
venue.name: Eckankar Temple of Connecticut

item.description:
We are in a time of rapid change.  How can you recreate a new golden age almost at will?  Learn to work with the four cycles of creativity to create the best possible life for yourself.  The facilitators are Mary Carol Moore and Bruce Fuller.

For more information, please contact Pete at 860-683-2754
item.how_to_find_us: The workshop will take place after worship service and fellowship in the large classroom downstairs.

group.name: The Central Connecticut Spiritual Experiences Group

item.name: Join us for a Workshop: "How to Create a Golden Age in Your Life."
